title: USA leaves Tokyo with Olympic GOLD in men's 4x400m relay (With Replays) | NBC Sports
author: NBC Sports
description:
Rai Benjamin sealed redemption for the United States men's relay team, sealing gold in the 4x400m to leave Tokyo on a high note. #NBCOlympics #Tokyo2020 #TrackAndField
